slide1.title: Pure Natural Herbal Honey
slide1.description: Discover the healing power of nature with our premium herbal honey collection

slide2.title: Special Promotions
slide2.description: Enjoy limited time discounts on our most popular products

natural.title: 100% Natural
natural.description: Our honey is pure, raw, and free from additives or preservatives.

healing.title: Healing Properties
healing.description: Enriched with herbs known for their medicinal benefits and healing powers.

love.title: Made with Love
love.description: Crafted with care by local beekeepers who respect traditional methods.

home.products_description: Discover our most loved herbal honey varieties, each with unique benefits and flavors.
home.story_paragraph1: Founded by beekeeping enthusiasts, Herbal Honey began as a small family operation with just a few hives. Our passion for natural healing and sustainable practices grew into a mission to share the benefits of herbal-infused honey with the world.
home.story_paragraph2: Today, we work with a network of local beekeepers who share our commitment to ethical beekeeping and environmental stewardship. Each batch of honey is carefully infused with organic herbs to create products that are not only delicious but also offer genuine health benefits.

testimonial1.text: This is the best honey I've ever tasted! The lavender infused honey helps me sleep so much better.
testimonial1.author: Sarah G.

testimonial2.text: The Manuka honey has helped tremendously with my seasonal allergies. I won't use any other brand now.
testimonial2.author: Michael J.

testimonial3.text: The ginger turmeric honey is perfect for soothing sore throats. My whole family loves it!
testimonial3.author: Emma R.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on new products, special offers, and health tips.

hero.title: About Herbal Honey
hero.description: For over a decade, we've been dedicated to providing the purest, most beneficial herbal honey products straight from nature's bounty.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded by beekeeping enthusiasts, Herbal Honey began as a small family operation with just a few hives. Our passion for natural healing and sustainable practices grew into a mission to share the benefits of herbal-infused honey with the world.
story.paragraph2: Today, we work with a network of local beekeepers who share our commitment to ethical beekeeping and environmental stewardship. Each batch of honey is carefully infused with organic herbs to create products that are not only delicious but also offer genuine health benefits.
story.paragraph3: We believe in the power of nature to heal and nourish, and we're committed to preserving traditional beekeeping methods while innovating with new herbal blends that meet modern wellness needs.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: These core principles guide everything we do, from beekeeping to product creation.

purity.title: Purity
purity.description: We never use additives, preservatives, or artificial ingredients. Our honey is always raw and unpasteurized to preserve its natural enzymes and health benefits.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We practice and promote sustainable beekeeping methods that protect bee populations and their natural habitats for generations to come.

healing.title: Healing
healing.description: We carefully select herbs known for their medicinal properties to create honey blends that support natural healing and overall wellness.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Discover our range of premium herbal honey products, each crafted with care and natural ingredients.

manuka.name: Manuka Herbal Honey
manuka.description: Rich in antioxidants with powerful antibacterial properties.

lavender.name: Lavender Infused Honey
lavender.description: Calming properties with a delicate floral aroma and flavor.

ginger.name: Ginger Turmeric Honey
ginger.description: Anti-inflammatory blend perfect for soothing sore throats.
